trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around November 30th 1999
divs: Sighting DetailsI was up quite late--around 2 am--and was in my 5th floor SW Washington DC apt. bedroom looking out the window at the sky. It faced south towards the Potomac. It was a clear evening and the stars were out. One in particular in the SE caught my eye as it seemed to be moving. It was far away and smaller compared, and at first I thought it might be an airplane or jet. It moved parallel to the sky, then stopped for a moment. As I watched, it then zipped back the other way so fast at about 45 degrees that there was no way that it could have been any type of air vehicle I knew of. It moved entirely too fast! I then didn't see it anymore. I couldn't believe what I had seen and tried to wake my husband to tell him about it.
Summary: Moved too fast to be a jet or airplane.
